name: Stingmon
effect: ＜Piercing＞ (When this Digimon attacks and deletes an opponent's Digimon and survives the battle, it performs any security checks it normally would.)
digivolve_effect: [Your Turn] While this Digimon has [Imperialdramon] in its name or [Free] in its traits, it gains ＜Piercing＞.
